name: 18Pcs Metric Drill and Tap Set with 1Pc Tap Wrench, M2 HSS Thread Tap Set from M2 to M12, Combination of Drill and Tap Set for Metal,with Exquisite Indexed Box
short_description: 【Perfect 18Pcs Metric Tap and Drill Set With Tap Wrench】Include 9 Size of Taps: M2x0.4, M2.5x0.45, M3x0.5, M4x0.7, M5x0.8, M6x1, M8x1.25, M10x1.5, & M12x1.75；9 Size of Drills: 1.6mm, 2.05mm, 2.5mm, 3.3mm, 4.2mm, 5mm, 6.75mm, 8.5mm, & 10.2mm；and 1pc Tap Wrench.This tap and drill tool kit will meet all your tapping needs.

【Top Quality】All the taps and drill bits in our tap tool sets are made of top-grade M2 ​​steel and are titanium-plated to ensure its high hardness, rust proof, sturdy and durable.Fits most drill driver brands on the market. The taps in this set can be driven by hand and machine.

【Widely Applications】This drill tap set are designed to Create new threads or re-thread damaged or jammed threads. Thread tap can process through holes or shallow blind holes, with downward chip removal, right-hand cutting, and fast and accurate tapping. Suitable for most metals, stainless steel, cast iron, aluminum, aluminum alloy, bronze and hard plastics.

【Exquisite Ultra-Hard Storage Box】All taps and drill bits are stored in an orderly manner in this exquisite ultra-hard Indexed storage box, which is very convenient for accessing and storing tap tools and convenient for carrying around. 【Note】The drill bit is very sharp and is tightly fixed to the drill bit holder. Please wear gloves or use tools to remove it from the holder.

【Warm Tips】Drill holes with a twist drill bit first, then tap with a thread tap. Tapping and drilling angle should be 90 degrees vertical and stable. The higher the hardness, the slower the speed. The tapping depth should not exceed 1.5 times the diameter of the tap (For example, the diameter M6x1 is about 6mm, and the depth should not exceed 9mm.)

name: THINKWORK Combination Drill Tap & Tap Bit Set, 3-in-1 Titanium Coated Screw Tapping Bit Tool for Drilling, Tapping, Countersinking, with Quick-Change Adapter, 13 PCS SAE/Metric
short_description: 【 Exquisite workmanship】Our taps are made of high speed steel, which can ensure sharp, fast execution and retain strength and efficiency. The surface is treated with a titanium alloy, which greatly improves the cutting performance of the drill, is more wear-resistant and prolongs the service life.

【Ergonomic design】The product portfolio includes SAE and metric sizes, so it has high versatility. Each tap drill is engraved with a label, which is convenient for you to choose the size that suits you. The convenient ¼-inch (6.35mm) hex shank has a tapered end to prevent excessive knocks. Back taper exceeds the tap to prevent over-drilling and damage to the thread.

【High efficiency 】 They are taps with drilling function, three-in-one operation, which can drill, tap, deburr and counter holes on copper, brass, aluminum, metal sheet and plastic at the same time, so as to quickly , Complete work completely, greatly save processing steps and time costs, and improve work efficiency.

【Various sizes】Can be used to tap various threads. 6PC SAE: 6-32NC, 8-32NC, 10-24NC, 10-32NC, 12-24NC, ¼-20NC; 6 metric-M3 x 0.5, M4 x 0.7, M5 x 0.8, M6 x 1.0, M8 x 1.25, M10 x 1.5; 1 piece-quick change adapter.

【After-sales service】If you encounter any problems or are not satisfied with the products while using our products, please feel free to contact us. The THINKWORK after-sales service team will contact you to solve your problem in time.

name: 22-Piece Hex Shank Drill and Tap Set for Metal, Impact Drill Bit Set, Upgrade Combination of Drill and Tap Set 6-32 UNC to 1/4-20 UNC, MRO & Industrial Grade, DIY Hex Screwdriver
short_description: 【Innovative Hex Shank Design】 Our Hex Shank Drill and Tap Set features an innovative design where hex shank taps are paired with matching hex drill bits. This unique setup enables both drilling and tapping operations to be carried out using just an impact driver. The hex shank design ensures a secure fit, preventing any spinning within the electrical tool chuck. With this set, you can leverage the convenience of portable wireless electrical tools for enhanced efficiency. Unlike traditional tapping methods that rely on machines, you can now effortlessly perform tapping tasks remotely, even in outdoor settings.

【Ideal for Thick Metal Plates】 Hex shank drill tap set offers a distinct advantage over traditional drill-tap combinations. Instead of having the drill and tap integrated into one tool, our set provides a reliable two-step process. First, drill the perfect-sized hole, and then create internal threads. The taps are equipped with long cutting, correcting, and supporting sections, which guarantee the production of high-quality threads that far surpass those made by combined taps. Moreover, all threads can be accurately inspected using a Go-No-Go Gauge, ensuring precision and consistency.

【Premium Quality and Advanced Manufacturing】 Crafted with excellence in mind, the Easy Cut split point design simplifies the drilling process, requiring less pressure and making it user-friendly. The premium High-Speed Steel (HSS) material ensures rapid cutting through tough materials, while its high hardness provides exceptional cutting power and durability. The hex drill bit and tap set is engineered to withstand high torque with impact-rated accuracy. The black and gold surface treatment not only enhances the aesthetic appeal but also significantly improves wear-resistance, extending the service life of the tools. For optimal cutting performance, simply apply cutting oil.

【Versatile Applications】 Designed for versatility, our hex drill and tap combination set excels at making shallow cuts in confined spaces. The quick-change drill and tap combo is a perfect fit for a wide range of applications, including industrial production, maintenance work, and DIY portable drilling projects. It can be used on various materials such as metal, aluminum, steel, wood, and plastics. The taps in this set are compatible with drills, impact drivers, machines, and can even be operated manually, offering flexibility for different working scenarios.

【Complete Set – Organized & Portable】 The set includes 5 drill bits of wire gauge sizes #7, #16, #25, #29, #36. It also includes 5 hand taps: 6-32 UNC, 8-32 UNC, 10-24 UNC, 1/4"-20 UNC, 12-24 UNC, quick change screwdriver bits. Blue case is easy to store and stack, keeping your tools organized and within reach.

name: Junreox 6 Pack Combination Drill and Tap Set, Professional HSS Titanium Thread Tap Drill Bit Set in SAE 6-32nc 8-32nc 10-32nc 10-24nc 12-24nc 1/4-20nc, Quick Change Screw Tapping with 1/4” Hex Shank
short_description: 【ALL-IN-ONE HIGH-EFFICIENCY TOOL】 Experience seamless drilling, tapping, and countersinking with our 3-in-1 combination drill tap set. It eliminates the need to switch tools midway, saving you time and costs while boosting work efficiency. A must-have for both DIYers and professionals

【VERSATILE PERFORMANCE】 Perfect for fabricating aluminum, plastic, wood, fiberglass, and other thin soft metals (under 1/8" thick), this tap and drill set delivers reliable performance from workshops to DIY projects. Note: Not suitable for high-hardness metals and stainless steel

【WIDE APPLICATION & COMPATIBILITY】 Junreox drill tap bits set including 6 sizes sae tap - 6-32nc 8-32nc 10-32nc 10-24nc 12-24nc 1/4-20nc, with 1/4-inch hex quick-change shank, our drill and tap bit set fits variety power tools, like electric hand drill, impact drill, bench drill, electric screwdriver and other tap machines, ensuring versatility across different applications & scenarioes

【USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN】Each thread tap drill bit is clearly engraved with its size on the hex shank for easy identification. The hex handle’s tapered end minimizes excessive impact, while the extended back taper prevents over-drilling and thread damage. A practical tool for precise and hassle-free use

【IMPORTANT TIPS FOR BEST RESULTS】 Use cutting oil, drill slowly, and ensure the tapping drill bit set is fully aligned and level to ensure straight tapping holes. Apply gentle pressure to prevent thread damage. For safety, always wear protective eyewear while using this threaded drill bits set

name: High Magnetic Screwdriver Drill Bit Set, 2025 New Anti Slip Magnetic Electric Screwdriver Set Alloy Steel for Impact Driver, Upgrade Strong Magnetic Durability Screwdriver Drill Bit Set (6)
short_description: Upgrade your toolkit, designed for precision, durability, and versatility. These drill bits are compatible with a wide range of tools, including impact drivers, conventional drills, electric screwdrivers, and manual screwdrivers

Perfect for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike, this set offers everything you need for secure and efficient screw driving. This precision design allows you to lock and fix screws accurately, making your work more efficient and reliable

Each bit is equipped with a strong magnet at the end, allowing you to easily pick up and fix screws without slipping or stripping. Available in 50mm, 65mm, 75mm, 100mm, 120mm, and 150mm sizes, these bits are designed to withstand repeated use without magnetic decay

This ensures a secure hold and precise placement every time. Whether you're working with wired or wireless drills, this set has you covered. The anti-slip teeth on each bit ensure a firm grip on screws, reducing the risk of cam-out and slippage

Our drill bits are engineered to handle high-speed torque applications. This design prevents distortion and breakage, even under intense use. The unique design allows the twisting part of the drill to bend under load, distributing pressure evenly and enhancing durability

name: Mesee 6 Pieces HSS Tap Drill Bit Set M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 Combination Drill & Taps Bits Hex Shank Blue Coated Spiral Screw Thread Tapping Tools for Drilling, Chamfering and Countersinking
short_description: 6 Pieces HSS Tap Drill Bit Set - Made of high-speed steel with blue coated, features high hardness and durability, wear-resistance
Combination Drill & Taps Bits Size - M3*0.5, M4*0.7, M5*0.8, M6*1.0, M8*1.25, M10*1.5, Each tap drill is engraved with its size, convenient for choosing the size you need
1/4-Inch Hex Shank - Standard shank countersink bits with anti-slip design for easy and quick change, suitable for cordless drills, electric screwdrivers, bench drills, and other tap machines.

3-in-1 Drill Tap Bits - Complete hole drilling, tapping, deburring and countersinking in one operation. Self-Centering point, do not need assistant center drilling or center punching. Back tapered beyond tap to prevent thread damage from over-drilling.

Widely Used - Used for drilling, tapping, deburring, and countersinking holes on plastic, PVC, fiberboard, wood, soft thin metal plate like copper, brass, aluminum. Perfect tool set to have for tapping, small repair projects, DIY projects, and home maintenance.

name: 6 Packs Combination Drill & Taps Bit Set, Screw Tapping in SAE Size 6-32nc 8-32nc 10-32nc 10-24nc 12-24nc 1/4-20nc with Anti-Rust Black Coating, 1/4” Hex Shank and Storage Case
short_description: COMBINE DRILL and TAP at the same time - All in one and works great and save a lot of time and trouble when doing threads for hinges or other projects; No more using a drill to drill the hole and then tapping it out later with another tool.

HIGH VERSATILITY – Set of 6 drill tap bits in SAE sizes 6-32NC, 8-32NC, 10-24NC, 10-32NC, 12-24NC, ¼-20NC, with 1/4inch hex quick-change shank, fit Electric hand drill, impact drill, bench drill, electric screwdriver and other tap machines.

HANDY TOOLS – These drill-tap bits are must have if you fabricate a lot; you can use them in aluminum, plastic, wood and other thin soft material metal panel; When you use it, make sure it is perfectly straight, take your time, go slow, use lubrication to prevent breaking the bit in the hole.

EASY TO USE - Each tap drill is engraved with its size convenient for you to choose the suitable size with a glance. A tapered end on hex shank can prevent excessive knocks; Back taper exceeds the tap to prevent over-drilling and damage to the thread.

WORRY-FREE – This Drill Tap Bits set comes with a portable storage case for convenient use and store. If you encounter any problems in using the products, please feel free to contact us for satisfactory customer service.

name: Greenlee DTAPKIT Drill/Tap Kit for Metal, One-Step Drilling, Tapping, and Deburring/Countersinking Set with Quick Change Adaptor, 6-32 to 1/4-20
short_description: 1-STEP DRILL/TAP KIT: Allows you to complete hole drilling, tapping, and deburring/countersinking in one simple operation using a power drill to save time and minimize labor
TAPS A VARIETY OF MATERIAL: Simplifies the process of tapping up to 10-gauge metal and creates holes in a variety of materials including aluminum, brass, copper, plastic, and mild steel
BACK-TAPERED AND HEX SHANK: Unique back-tapered design protects against thread damage from over-drilling, while the sturdy hex shank ensures a strong connection to the drill chuck
HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION: Hardened high-speed steel withstands heavy-duty use on the jobsite and offers a longer life than carbon-steel tools
QUICK CHANGE ADAPTOR AND CASE: Kit includes a quick change adaptor to help you get the job done faster than ever and a rugged plastic carrying case for easy transportation
product_description: Master your jobs with speed and accuracy with the Greenlee Drill/Tap Kit (catalog number DTAPKIT). Designed for plumbing experts, this drill/tap kit allows you to complete hole drilling, tapping, and deburring/countersinking in one simple operation using a power drill to save time and minimize labor. It simplifies the process of tapping up to 10-gauge metal and creates holes in a variety of materials including aluminum, brass, copper, plastic, and mild steel. The unique back-tapered design protects against thread damage from over-drilling, while the sturdy hex shank ensures a strong connection to the drill chuck for a superior performance every time. Constructed from hardened high-speed steel, these durable power tool accessories withstand heavy-duty use on the jobsite and offer a longer life than carbon-steel tools. This drilling and tapping kit includes a quick change adaptor to help you get the job done faster than ever and a rugged plastic carrying case for easy transportation. Greenlee: Professional. Nothing Less.™
